metadata.inclusion:
1. Enter programming code and confirm
2. Press 9 and confirm
3. 2 long beeps indicate success, 3 short beeps indicate failure
metadata.exclusion:
1. Enter programming code and confirm
2. Press 9 and confirm
3. 2 long beeps indicate success, 3 short beeps indicate failure
metadata.reset: Press the R button for more than 5 seconds until you hear 3 long beeps.
